statements: SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT report_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM incident_reports;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT report_id, reported_by, department FROM incident_reports WHERE compliance_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM incident_reports;
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reported_by;
SELECT department, AVG(compliance_level) AS avg_compliance FROM incident_reports GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT AVG(compliance_level) AS avg_compliance FROM incident_reports WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date > '2021-06-30' GROUP BY reported_by;
SELECT department, MAX(compliance_level) AS max_compliance FROM incident_reports GROUP BY department;
SELECT report_id, incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date >= '2021-08-01' AND compliance_level < 4;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_description IS NOT NULL GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE compliance_level IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE department IN ('HR', 'Finance');
SELECT department, AVG(compliance_level) AS avg_compliance FROM incident_reports WHERE compliance_level >= 4 GROUP BY department;
SELECT MAX(compliance_level) AS max_compliance FROM incident_reports WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE department='IT' AND compliance_level > 3
SELECT report_id, incident_date, reported_by FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports
SELECT incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(incident_description) > 100
SELECT report_id, reported_by, compliance_level FROM incident_reports WHERE compliance_level >= 2 ORDER BY compliance_level DESC
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM incident_reports
SELECT AVG(compliance_level) AS avg_compliance FROM incident_reports
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_description LIKE '%security%'
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT MAX(compliance_level) AS max_compliance FROM incident_reports
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reported_by ORDER BY total_reports DESC
SELECT department, AVG(compliance_level) AS avg_compliance FROM incident_reports GROUP BY department
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE department IN ('HR', 'Finance')
SELECT report_id, incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE compliance_level > (SELECT AVG(compliance_level) FROM incident_reports) ORDER BY compliance_level DESC
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reported_by HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT department, MAX(compliance_level) AS max_compliance FROM incident_reports GROUP BY department
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE department='IT' OR department='HR'
SELECT AVG(compliance_level) AS avg_compliance, MIN(compliance_level) AS min_compliance FROM incident_reports
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE department='IT' AND compliance_level > (SELECT AVG(compliance_level) FROM incident_reports) ORDER BY compliance_level DESC
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reported_by
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT id, report_date, description FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT id, reporter_name, status FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceInvestigations;
SELECT id, incident_id, investigator_name FROM ComplianceInvestigations;
SELECT investigation_date, findings FROM ComplianceInvestigations;
SELECT id, findings, corrective_actions FROM ComplianceInvestigations;
SELECT reporter_name, status FROM IncidentReports WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT id, description FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceInvestigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE reporter_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT reporter_name, status FROM IncidentReports WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT id, findings FROM ComplianceInvestigations WHERE findings <> '';
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT MAX(report_date) FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT MIN(investigation_date) FROM ComplianceInvestigations;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT AVG(report_date) FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT id, reporter_name, status FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT id, investigation_date, findings FROM ComplianceInvestigations ORDER BY investigation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE reporter_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, description FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports INNER JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id;
SELECT IncidentReports.*, ComplianceInvestigations.investigator_name FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT reporter_name, AVG(LENGTH(description)) AS avg_description_length FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter_name;

SELECT reporter_name, status, COUNT(*) AS total_investigations FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id GROUP BY reporter_name, status;
SELECT reporter_name, MIN(report_date) AS first_report_date FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_investigations, AVG(LENGTH(findings)) AS avg_findings_length FROM ComplianceInvestigations GROUP BY investigator_name;
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports, MIN(report_date) AS first_report_date, MAX(report_date) AS last_report_date FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter_name;

SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_investigations, MAX(investigation_date) AS latest_investigation_date FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id GROUP BY reporter_name;

SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_investigations, SUM(LENGTH(corrective_actions)) AS total_corrective_actions_length FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id GROUP BY reporter_name;

SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_investigations, AVG(DATE_PART('day', now()::timestamp - investigation_date)) AS avg_days_to_investigate FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id WHERE status = 'Open' GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports, MAX(report_date) - MIN(report_date) AS report_period FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_open_investigations FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id WHERE status = 'Open';

SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_investigations, MAX(investigation_date) - MIN(investigation_date) AS investigation_period FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports, (MAX(report_date) - MIN(report_date)) / 365 AS avg_reports_per_year FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY reporter_name;

SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_investigations, AVG(DATE_PART('day', investigation_date - report_date)) AS avg_days_between_report_and_investigation FROM IncidentReports LEFT JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id GROUP BY reporter_name;

SELECT report_title, report_description FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY date_reported DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceInvestigations WHERE investigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT reported_by FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT investigator_name, investigation_date FROM ComplianceInvestigations ORDER BY investigation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports JOIN ComplianceInvestigations ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceInvestigations.incident_id;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM IncidentReports JOIN ComplianceReports ON IncidentReports.id = ComplianceReports.investigation_id;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT investigator_name) FROM ComplianceInvestigations;
SELECT MAX(report_date) FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_title LIKE '%security%';
SELECT investigation_id, COUNT(*) FROM ComplianceReports GROUP BY investigation_id;
SELECT report_title, COUNT(*) FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY report_title;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceInvestigations WHERE investigation_date < '2022-03-01' AND findings IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(report_id) FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE date_reported >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT report_id, incident_date FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT location, description FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT * FROM ReportComments;
SELECT comment_id, commenter_name FROM ReportComments;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM ReportComments;
SELECT * FROM InvestigatorNotes;
SELECT note_id, investigator_name FROM InvestigatorNotes;
SELECT note_text, note_date FROM InvestigatorNotes;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceLogs;
SELECT log_id, event_date FROM ComplianceLogs;
SELECT event_description, investigator_name FROM ComplianceLogs;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports JOIN ReportComments ON IncidentReports.report_id = ReportComments.report_id;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports JOIN InvestigatorNotes ON IncidentReports.report_id = InvestigatorNotes.report_id;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports JOIN ComplianceLogs ON IncidentReports.report_id = ComplianceLogs.event_description;

SELECT IncidentReports.report_id, IncidentReports.incident_date, ReportComments.commenter_name, ReportComments.comment_date FROM IncidentReports JOIN ReportComments ON IncidentReports.report_id = ReportComments.report_id;

SELECT IncidentReports.report_id, IncidentReports.location, InvestigatorNotes.investigator_name, InvestigatorNotes.note_date FROM IncidentReports JOIN InvestigatorNotes ON IncidentReports.report_id = InvestigatorNotes.report_id;

SELECT IncidentReports.report_id, IncidentReports.incident_date, ComplianceLogs.log_id, ComplianceLogs.event_date FROM IncidentReports JOIN ComplianceLogs ON IncidentReports.report_id = ComplianceLogs.event_description;

SELECT ReportComments.comment_id, ReportComments.comment_text, InvestigatorNotes.note_text, ComplianceLogs.event_description FROM ReportComments JOIN InvestigatorNotes ON ReportComments.report_id = InvestigatorNotes.report_id JOIN ComplianceLogs ON InvestigatorNotes.report_id = ComplianceLogs.event_description;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ReportComments;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM InvestigatorNotes;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ComplianceLogs;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE location='ABC City';
SELECT report_id, incident_date FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports JOIN ReportComments ON IncidentReports.report_id = ReportComments.report_id;

SELECT IncidentReports.report_id, IncidentReports.incident_date, ReportComments.commenter_name, ReportComments.comment_text FROM IncidentReports INNER JOIN ReportComments ON IncidentReports.report_id = ReportComments.report_id;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE description LIKE '%crime%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT investigator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_notes FROM InvestigatorNotes GROUP BY investigator_name;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT incident_date, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM IncidentReports GROUP BY incident_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_id = '31e27827-2d6c-4e35-b488-790cc0706d95';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date > '2022-06-01' AND incident_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND location = 'XYZ Town';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_notes FROM InvestigatorNotes WHERE note_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE location='ABC City' AND description LIKE '%robbery%';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceLogs WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT investigator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM ComplianceLogs GROUP BY investigator_name ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT incident_id, report_date, description FROM incident_reports;
SELECT incident_id, reporter_name, status FROM incident_reports;
SELECT * FROM incident_images;
SELECT image_id, incident_id, image_url FROM incident_images;
SELECT * FROM incident_locations;
SELECT location_id, incident_id, location_name FROM incident_locations;
SELECT * FROM incident_types;
SELECT type_id, type_name FROM incident_types;
SELECT * FROM incident_comments;
SELECT comment_id, incident_id, commenter_name, comment_text FROM incident_comments;
SELECT incident_id, reporter_name, status FROM incident_reports WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM incident_locations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM incident_types WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM incident_comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incident_types INNER JOIN incident_reports ON incident_types.type_id = incident_reports.incident_id GROUP BY type_name;
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM incident_reports INNER JOIN incident_comments ON incident_reports.incident_id = incident_comments.incident_id GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incident_locations INNER JOIN incident_reports ON incident_locations.incident_id = incident_reports.incident_id GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT type_name, AVG(comment_date) AS avg_comment_date FROM incident_types INNER JOIN incident_comments ON incident_types.type_id = incident_comments.incident_id GROUP BY type_name;

SELECT reporter_name, MAX(comment_date) AS latest_comment_date FROM incident_reports INNER JOIN incident_comments ON incident_reports.incident_id = incident_comments.incident_id GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE status='Resolved';
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reporter_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT ir.report_date, ii.image_url FROM incident_reports ir INNER JOIN incident_images ii ON ir.incident_id = ii.incident_id;
SELECT il.location_name, ic.commenter_name, ic.comment_text FROM incident_locations il INNER JOIN incident_comments ic ON il.incident_id = ic.incident_id;
SELECT it.type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incident_types it INNER JOIN incident_reports ir ON it.type_id = ir.incident_id GROUP BY it.type_name ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
SELECT ir.report_date, it.type_name, ic.comment_text FROM incident_reports ir JOIN incident_types it ON ir.incident_id = it.type_id JOIN incident_comments ic ON ir.incident_id = ic.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT reporter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports WHERE status='Open' GROUP BY reporter_name;

SELECT il.location_name, ir.description, ii.image_url FROM incident_locations il JOIN incident_reports ir ON il.incident_id = ir.incident_id JOIN incident_images ii ON il.incident_id = ii.incident_id;
SELECT ic.commenter_name, ic.comment_text, ir.report_date FROM incident_comments ic JOIN incident_reports ir ON ic.incident_id = ir.incident_id ORDER BY ic.comment_date DESC;
SELECT il.address, it.type_name, ir.report_date FROM incident_locations il JOIN incident_types it ON il.incident_id = it.type_id JOIN incident_reports ir ON il.incident_id = ir.incident_id;

SELECT ic.*, ir.report_date, il.location_name FROM incident_comments ic JOIN incident_reports ir ON ic.incident_id = ir.incident_id JOIN incident_locations il ON ic.incident_id = il.incident_id WHERE ic.comment_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT DISTINCT it.type_name FROM incident_types it JOIN incident_reports ir ON it.type_id = ir.incident_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM incident_comments WHERE comment_date > '2022-06-01';

SELECT ir.reporter_name, il.address, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM incident_reports ir JOIN incident_locations il ON ir.incident_id = il.incident_id GROUP BY ir.reporter_name, il.address ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT it.type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incident_types it LEFT JOIN incident_reports ir ON it.type_id = ir.type_id GROUP BY it.type_name ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;

SELECT ir.report_date, il.location_name, ic.comment_text FROM incident_reports ir LEFT JOIN incident_locations il ON ir.incident_id = il.incident_id LEFT JOIN incident_comments ic ON ir.incident_id = ic.incident_id;
SELECT reporter_name, MIN(report_date) AS earliest_date, MAX(report_date) AS latest_date FROM incident_reports GROUP BY reporter_name;
SELECT il.address, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incident_locations il LEFT JOIN incident_reports ir ON il.incident_id = ir.incident_id GROUP BY il.address ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;

SELECT ir.report_date, it.type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM incident_reports ir JOIN incident_types it ON ir.type_id = it.type_id JOIN incident_comments ic ON ir.incident_id = ic.incident_id GROUP BY ir.report_date, it.type_name;
